mapper.select: SELECT m.member_id, pd_name, select_option, brand_name, pd_price, pd_image_url, deli_pay, cart_id, stock, pd_id FROM cart c JOIN member m ON c.member_id = m.member_id JOIN product p ON p.pd_id = c.pd_id JOIN brand b ON b.brand_id = p.brand_id JOIN product_image pi ON pi.pd_id = p.pd_id JOIN large_ctgr lc ON p.large_ctgr_id = lc.large_ctgr_id JOIN main_ctgr mc ON lc.main_ctgr_id = mc.main_ctgr_id JOIN delivery_pay dp ON dp.main_ctgr_id = mc.main_ctgr_id WHERE m.member_id = 'yujin@naver.com'
